      • getOrCreateSkinForPlayer

        public Object getOrCreateSkinForPlayer(String name,
                                       boolean silent)
                                throws SkinRequestException
        This methods seeks out players actual skin (chosen or not) and returns either null (if no skin data found) or the property object conatining all the skin data.

        Also, it schedules a skin update to stay up to date with skin changes.

        Parameters:
        name - Player name to search skin for
        silent - Whether to throw errors or not
        Returns:
        Property Platform specific Property Object
        Throws:
        SkinRequestException - If MojangAPI lookup errors

      • getPlayerSkin

        public String getPlayerSkin(String name)
        Returns the custom skin name that player has set.

        Returns null if player has no custom skin set.

      • getSkinData

        public Object getSkinData(String name,
                          boolean updateOutdated)
        Returns property object containing skin data of the wanted skin
        Parameters:
        name - - Skin name
        updateOutdated - - On true we update the skin if expired

      • getSkinData

        public Object getSkinData(String name)

      • updateSkinData

        public boolean updateSkinData(String skin)
                       throws SkinRequestException
        Parameters:
        skin -
        Returns:
        True on updated
        Throws:
        SkinRequestException - On updating disabled OR invalid username + api error

      • getDefaultSkinNameIfEnabled

        public String getDefaultSkinNameIfEnabled(String player,
                                          boolean clear)
        Filters player name to exclude non [a-z_] Checks and process default skin. IF no default skin: 1: Return player if clear 2: Return skin if found Else: return player
        Parameters:
        player - - Player name
        clear - - return player instead of his set skin
        Returns:
        - setSkin or DefaultSkin, if player has no setSkin or default skin, we return his name

      • getDefaultSkinNameIfEnabled

        public String getDefaultSkinNameIfEnabled(String player)
